title: Trying to purchase rp.. fucking nightmare
body:
So the other day I tried to use my new card to purchase rp and It said I had attempted too many times and should wait 24 hours, I have waited two days and just want to purchase my rp so I can server swap to NA since I'm on vacation for a month. Could a rioter please help me?

Also I already sent in a ticket and got a response although I did what he said and it didn't do ANYTHING.

Thanks
- Srtty

replies.body:
Hey there,

If you've already got a ticket open, please continue discussing your issue with Player Support. They're the only ones who are able to help with transaction related issues.
